{# Created template by KSneijders (based of a partial of './attribute.html') Used for properties which are usually shown as functions, not sure why. Currently showing them as attributes. #} {% filter heading(heading_level, role="attr", id=html_id, class="doc doc-heading", toc_label=name) %} {% filter highlight(language="python", inline=True) %} {{ function.name }} {% endfilter %} {% with labels = function.labels %} {% include "labels.html" with context %} {% endwith %} {% endfilter %} {% if function.annotation %} {% with expression = function.annotation %} {% include "expression.html" with context %} {% endwith %} {% endif %}
